def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if (b - a + 1) >= k and (b - a + 1) % k == 0 \
        else "NG"
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if (b-a+1) >= k and (b-a+1) % k == 0 else "NG"
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if (b - a + 1) >= k and (b - a + 1) % k == 0 else "NG"
    print(ans)

k = int(input())
a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a % k == 0:
    print("OK")
elif b % k == 0:
    print("OK")
else:
    print("NG")


k = int(input())  # input k
a, b = map(int, input().split())  # input a, b

if a % k == 0:  # if a is multiple of k
    print("OK")
elif b % k == 0:
    print("OK")
else:
    print("NG")


def main():
    k = int(input())
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    ans = "OK" if (b - a + 1) >= k and (b - a + 1) % k == 0 else "NG" 
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
